description:
Futomomo
(or “fat leg”) shibari is the technique of binding the lower leg to the thigh. Kanso and True Blue (of Bondage Erotique) show how you can quickly and smoothly tie this important foundation of Japanese rope bondage, as well as a beautiful and functional
leg lacing
technique for tying the legs together. Learn about proper rope handling and safety, as well as some of the rich tradition behind the ties.

Photos for this tutorial include step-by-step images.
title: Shibari 201 - Futomomo Leg Binding and Leg Lacing
